name: RealorFake
0:
”Alexa, open real or fake”
”Alexa, start real or fake”
”Alexa, launch real or fake”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: real or fake
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Test your knowledge with "Real or Fake", the perfect skill for quiz lovers.

We're surrounded by information, but how good are we at telling what's real from what's fake?

Alexa will present statements on a wide range of topics, and it's up to you to figure out whether they're true or just made-up. Play solo to sharpen your skills or have fun with friends in a multiplayer challenge! 

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Are you ready to find out who’s the king of "Real or Fake"?

Have Fun!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
